solution_line_template: For buying {bought_jackets} jackets Martha gets {bought_jackets} jackets / {jackets_for_free_divisor} = <<{bought_jackets}/{jackets_for_free_divisor}={free_jackets}>>{free_jackets} jackets for free

For buying {bought_tshirts} t-shirts, Martha gets {bought_tshirts} t-shirts/ {tshirts_for_free_divisor} = <<{bought_tshirts}/{tshirts_for_free_divisor}={free_tshirts}>>{free_tshirts} t-shirts for free
Adding the free jackets, Martha gets {bought_jackets} jackets + {free_jackets} jackets = <<{bought_jackets}+{free_jackets}={total_jackets}>>{total_jackets} jackets
Adding the free t-shirts, Martha gets {bought_tshirts} t-shirts + {free_tshirts} t-shirts = <<{bought_tshirts}+{free_tshirts}={total_tshirts}>>{total_tshirts} t-shirts.
In total, Martha will take home {total_jackets} jackets + {total_tshirts} t-shirts = <<{total_jackets}+{total_tshirts}={total_clothes}>>{total_clothes} clothes
